content: Jan 18 U.S. cable service provider Cable One Inc  said on Wednesday it would buy privately held rival NewWave Communications for $735 million in cash to expand in non-urban markets.
name: Cable One Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Cable One to buy privately held NewWave for $735 mln
